snippet: In his first visit to an American Indian reservation as president, Mr. Obama told the crowd that he had delivered on a campaign promise to improve relations between the government and the nation’s tribes.
abstract: Pres Obama, making his first visit to an American Indian reservation as president, tells raucous of 1,800 people at Standing Rock Sioux Reservation that he has delivered on a campaign promise to improve relations between the government and the nation’s tribes; powwow honors American Indians who have served in America's foreign wars.
lead_paragraph: In his first visit to an American Indian reservation as president, Mr. Obama told the crowd that he had delivered on a campaign promise to improve relations between the government and the nation’s tribes.

headline.main: Obama Visits Sioux Lands on a Trip Shadowed by Iraq
headline.print_headline: Obama Visits Sioux Lands on a Trip Shadowed by Iraq
